feed.title: Fireshare Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Fireshare: v1.2.21
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix LDAP auth crash, switch to SCOPE_SUBTREE, and improve logging by @msmcpeake in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/275

New Contributors

  • @msmcpeake made their first contribution in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/275

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/compare/v1.2.20...v1.2.21

entry.title: New release for Fireshare: v1.2.22
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Repo] Addition of news file and documentation to the repo for future update. by @J-Stuff in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/281
  • Update develop with news files by @J-Stuff in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/285
  • Feature/show file size used by @theotherguy2175 in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/284
  • Feature/issue 230 fix by @theotherguy2175 in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/283
  • Feature/auto play video by @theotherguy2175 in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/286
  • Version increase by @ShaneIsrael in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/290

New Contributors

  • @theotherguy2175 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/284

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/compare/v1.2.21...v1.2.22

entry.title: New release for Fireshare: v1.2.23
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Various minor updates to file size and discord integration by @ShaneIsrael
  • New Feature - Discord Notification Integration by @theotherguy2175 in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/295
  • New Feature - Disk Usage Information @theotherguy2175 in https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/pull/294

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ShaneIsrael/fireshare/compare/v1.2.22...v1.2.23

entry.title: New release for Fireshare: v1.2.25
